*div1 type="summary"* *p*Robert Leftwich or Haden Edwards to Austin, May 12, 1825. Grant finally obtained. Suggests agreement among empresarios concerning local government and price of land. Bastrop's fidelity and efficiency.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Refugio */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="05-12-1825">12th [May] 1825*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*Dear *person_mentioned*Austin*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*I have the pleasure of informing you that my long and unremitted exertions have been finally crowned with success having received a *location_mentioned*Grant */location_mentioned*bounded as asked for when you was in *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*with the exception of the part lying *location_mentioned*below the San Antonio road*/location_mentioned**location_mentioned* in the fork of the Rivers Brassos*/location_mentioned* and *location_mentioned*Navisote */location_mentioned*being informed by *person_mentioned*Baron de Bastrop */person_mentioned*that this part has already been disposed of I changed my application making the road the line. */p* *p*Several others have obtained *location_mentioned*grants */location_mentioned*of which *person_mentioned*Capt DeWitt*/person_mentioned* will inform you this being the case it becomes necessary that all the *person_mentioned*Empresarios */person_mentioned*should make such disposition of their *location_mentioned*lands */location_mentioned*that will not effect the interest of an other and that will be satisfactory to the *person_mentioned*emigrants */person_mentioned*and that will promote the immediate settlement of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned* to affect this it will require that some uniform mode be established to Govern the whole which I have no doubt that each of the *person_mentioned*Empresarios */person_mentioned*are disposed to agree to.*/p*
*p*I presume that you still adhere to your first price established viz 12 1/2 cts per acre the exps of surveying and making the title which I am of Opinion is low enough when we take into consideration the trouble and hardships we have to undergo in settling a *location_mentioned*wilderness*/location_mentioned*.*/p* *p*On the subject I wish you to write me by*person_mentioned* Capt De Witt*/person_mentioned* who can put the letter in the first *location_mentioned*post Office*/location_mentioned* that he reaches in the *location_mentioned*United States*/location_mentioned* unless a vessel should sail from your place to *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned* in a short time.*/p*
*p*I will suggest to you that it is very important to the interest of *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*that *person_mentioned*Baron de Bastrop*/person_mentioned* should be reelected as from what I have seen of him I presume that you can send no person that will use the same exertions for that section of *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*or that is as well qualified for your representation. And I can assure you that he is devoted to your interest*/p*
*p*I refer you to *person_mentioned*Capt De Witt*/person_mentioned* for a detail of the news in this part of the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*Wishing you health and prosperity.*/p* *p*Yours sincerely*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*[Robert Leftwich?]*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*[or *person_mentioned*Haden Edwards?]*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
